This subtitle does not apply to:
A service contract provider that does not sell vehicle protection products; or
A warranty, indemnity agreement, or guarantee that is not provided in connection with the sale of a vehicle protection product.
A vehicle protection product warranty is not subject to the provisions of Subtitle 4 of this title.
A seller or warrantor of a vehicle protection product, or a warrantor's administrator, that complies with this subtitle is not subject to any provisions of the Insurance Article.
